bioconda.name: bioconductor-affycoretools
bioconda.summary: Functions useful for those doing repetitive analyses with Affymetrix GeneChips

biotools.summary: Various wrapper functions that have been written to streamline the more common analyses that a core Biostatistician might see.

bioschemas.summary: Various wrapper functions that have been written to streamline the more common analyses that a core Biostatistician might see.
